column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Dessert: We got the mixed platter that came with six small desserts. Each one had enough so that each of us got at least one bite
column2: then another for whoever liked it the most. I especially liked the creme brulee & passion fruit sorbet. We also ordered the bananas with caramel sauce & pistachios. It was also delicious and a much bigger portion.
